verses.verse: וִֽירִיחוֹ֙ <S%H3405><s%> Now Jericho סֹגֶ֣רֶת <S%H5462><s%> was straitly וּמְסֻגֶּ֔רֶת <S%H5462><s%> shut up מִפְּנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> because בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel אֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> no יוֹצֵ֖א <S%H3318><s%> none went out וְאֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> one בָּֽא׃ <S%H935><s%> and none came in ס

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יְהוֹשֻׁ֔עַ <S%H3091><s%> unto Joshua רְאֵה֙ <S%H7200><s%> See נָתַ֣תִּי <S%H5414><s%> I have given בְיָֽדְךָ֔ <S%H3027><s%> into thine hand אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְרִיח֖וֹ <S%H3405><s%> Jericho וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מַלְכָּ֑הּ <S%H4428><s%> and the king גִּבּוֹרֵ֖י <S%H1368><s%> thereof [and] the mighty men הֶחָֽיִל׃ <S%H2428><s%> of valour

וְסַבֹּתֶ֣ם <S%H5437><s%> And ye shall compass אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָעִ֗יר <S%H5892><s%> the city כֹּ֚ל <S%H3605><s%> all אַנְשֵׁ֣י <S%H376><s%> the men הַמִּלְחָמָ֔ה <S%H4421><s%> of war הַקֵּ֥יף <S%H5362><s%> [and] go round about אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָעִ֖יר <S%H5892><s%> the city פַּ֣עַם <S%H6471><s%> anvil אֶחָ֑ת <S%H259><s%> a כֹּ֥ה <S%H3541><s%> so תַעֲשֶׂ֖ה <S%H6213><s%> Thus shalt thou do שֵׁ֥שֶׁת <S%H8337><s%> six יָמִֽים׃ <S%H3117><s%> days

וְשִׁבְעָ֣ה <S%H7651><s%> And seven כֹהֲנִ֡ים <S%H3548><s%> priests יִשְׂאוּ֩ <S%H5375><s%> shall bear שִׁבְעָ֨ה <S%H7651><s%> seven שׁוֹפְר֤וֹת <S%H7782><s%> trumpets הַיּֽוֹבְלִים֙ <S%H3104><s%> of rams' horns לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> before הָאָר֔וֹן <S%H727><s%> the ark וּבַיּוֹם֙ <S%H3117><s%> day הַשְּׁבִיעִ֔י <S%H7637><s%> and the seventh תָּסֹ֥בּוּ <S%H5437><s%> ye shall compass אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָעִ֖יר <S%H5892><s%> the city שֶׁ֣בַע <S%H7651><s%> seven פְּעָמִ֑ים <S%H6471><s%> times וְהַכֹּ֣הֲנִ֔ים <S%H3548><s%> and the priests יִתְקְע֖וּ <S%H8628><s%> shall blow בַּשּׁוֹפָרֽוֹת׃ <S%H7782><s%> with the trumpets

וְהָיָ֞ה <S%H1961><s%> become בִּמְשֹׁ֣ךְ ׀ <S%H4900><s%> And it shall come to pass that when they make a long בְּקֶ֣רֶן <S%H7161><s%> horn הַיּוֹבֵ֗ל <S%H3104><s%> [blast] with the ram's [בְּשָׁמְעֲכֶם כ] (כְּשָׁמְעֲכֶם֙ <S%H8085><s%> listen ק) אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ק֣וֹל <S%H6963><s%> the sound הַשּׁוֹפָ֔ר <S%H7782><s%> of the trumpet יָרִ֥יעוּ <S%H7321><s%> shall shout כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָעָ֖ם <S%H5971><s%> all the people תְּרוּעָ֣ה <S%H8643><s%> shout גְדוֹלָ֑ה <S%H1419><s%> with a great וְנָ֨פְלָ֜ה <S%H5307><s%> shall fall down חוֹמַ֤ת <S%H2346><s%> and the wall הָעִיר֙ <S%H5892><s%> of the city תַּחְתֶּ֔יהָ <S%H8478><s%> flat וְעָל֥וּ <S%H5927><s%> shall ascend up הָעָ֖ם <S%H5971><s%> and the people אִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> every man נֶגְדּֽוֹ׃ <S%H5048><s%> straight

וַיִּקְרָ֞א <S%H7121><s%> called יְהוֹשֻׁ֤עַ <S%H3091><s%> And Joshua בִּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son נוּן֙ <S%H5126><s%> of Nun אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about הַכֹּ֣הֲנִ֔ים <S%H3548><s%> the priests וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and said אֲלֵהֶ֔ם <S%H413><s%> to שְׂא֖וּ <S%H5375><s%> unto them Take up אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֲר֣וֹן <S%H727><s%> the ark הַבְּרִ֑ית <S%H1285><s%> of the covenant וְשִׁבְעָ֣ה <S%H7651><s%> and let seven כֹֽהֲנִ֗ים <S%H3548><s%> priests יִשְׂאוּ֙ <S%H5375><s%> bear שִׁבְעָ֤ה <S%H7651><s%> seven שֽׁוֹפְרוֹת֙ <S%H7782><s%> trumpets יוֹבְלִ֔ים <S%H3104><s%> of rams' horns לִפְנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> before אֲר֥וֹן <S%H727><s%> the ark יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD

[וַיֹּאמְרוּ כ] (וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <S%H559><s%> answer ק) אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הָעָ֔ם <S%H5971><s%> unto the people עִבְר֖וּ <S%H5674><s%> Pass on וְסֹ֣בּוּ <S%H5437><s%> and compass אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָעִ֑יר <S%H5892><s%> the city וְהֶ֣חָל֔וּץ <S%H2502><s%> and let him that is armed יַעֲבֹ֕ר <S%H5674><s%> pass on לִפְנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> before אֲר֥וֹן <S%H727><s%> the ark יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD

וַיְהִ֗י <S%H1961><s%> become כֶּאֱמֹ֣ר <S%H559><s%> had spoken יְהוֹשֻׁעַ֮ <S%H3091><s%> And it came to pass when Joshua אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הָעָם֒ <S%H5971><s%> unto the people וְשִׁבְעָ֣ה <S%H7651><s%> that the seven הַכֹּהֲנִ֡ים <S%H3548><s%> priests נֹשְׂאִים֩ <S%H5375><s%> bearing שִׁבְעָ֨ה <S%H7651><s%> the seven שׁוֹפְר֤וֹת <S%H7782><s%> trumpets הַיּֽוֹבְלִים֙ <S%H3104><s%> of rams' horns לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> before יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD עָבְר֕וּ <S%H5674><s%> passed on וְתָקְע֖וּ <S%H8628><s%> and blew בַּשּֽׁוֹפָר֑וֹת <S%H7782><s%> with the trumpets וַֽאֲרוֹן֙ <S%H727><s%> and the ark בְּרִ֣ית <S%H1285><s%> of the covenant יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD הֹלֵ֖ךְ <S%H1980><s%> followed אַחֲרֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H310><s%> them

וְהֶחָל֣וּץ <S%H2502><s%> And the armed הֹלֵ֔ךְ <S%H1980><s%> men went לִפְנֵי֙ <S%H6440><s%> before הַכֹּ֣הֲנִ֔ים <S%H3548><s%> the priests [תָּקְעוּ כ] (תֹּקְעֵ֖י <S%H8628><s%> blew ק) הַשּֽׁוֹפָר֑וֹת <S%H7782><s%> with the trumpets וְהַֽמְאַסֵּ֗ף <S%H622><s%> and the rereward הֹלֵךְ֙ <S%H1980><s%> came אַחֲרֵ֣י <S%H310><s%> after הָאָר֔וֹן <S%H727><s%> the ark הָל֖וֹךְ <S%H1980><s%> [the priests] going on וְתָק֥וֹעַ <S%H8628><s%> and blowing בַּשּׁוֹפָרֽוֹת׃ <S%H7782><s%> with the trumpets

וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָעָם֩ <S%H5971><s%> the people צִוָּ֨ה <S%H6680><s%> had commanded יְהוֹשֻׁ֜עַ <S%H3091><s%> And Joshua לֵאמֹ֗ר <S%H559><s%> saying לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> nor תָרִ֙יעוּ֙ <S%H7321><s%> Ye shall not shout וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> nor תַשְׁמִ֣יעוּ <S%H8085><s%> nor make any noise אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> קוֹלְכֶ֔ם <S%H6963><s%> with your voice וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> nor יֵצֵ֥א <S%H3318><s%> proceed מִפִּיכֶ֖ם <S%H6310><s%> out of your mouth דָּבָ֑ר <S%H1697><s%> neither shall [any] word עַ֠ד <S%H5704><s%> until י֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> until the day אָמְרִ֧י <S%H559><s%> I bid אֲלֵיכֶ֛ם <S%H413><s%> about הָרִ֖יעוּ <S%H7321><s%> you shout וַהֲרִיעֹתֶֽם׃ <S%H7321><s%> then shall ye shout

וַיַּסֵּ֤ב <S%H5437><s%> compassed אֲרוֹן־ <S%H727><s%> So the ark יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָעִ֔יר <S%H5892><s%> the city הַקֵּ֖ף <S%H5362><s%> going about פַּ֣עַם <S%H6471><s%> anvil אֶחָ֑ת <S%H259><s%> they וַיָּבֹ֙אוּ֙ <S%H935><s%> and they came הַֽמַּחֲנֶ֔ה <S%H4264><s%> into the camp וַיָּלִ֖ינוּ <S%H3885><s%> and lodged בַּֽמַּחֲנֶֽה׃ <S%H4264><s%> in the camp פ

וַיַּשְׁכֵּ֥ם <S%H7925><s%> rose early יְהוֹשֻׁ֖עַ <S%H3091><s%> And Joshua בַּבֹּ֑קֶר <S%H1242><s%> in the morning וַיִּשְׂא֥וּ <S%H5375><s%> took up הַכֹּהֲנִ֖ים <S%H3548><s%> and the priests אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֲר֥וֹן <S%H727><s%> the ark יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD

וְשִׁבְעָ֣ה <S%H7651><s%> And seven הַכֹּהֲנִ֡ים <S%H3548><s%> priests נֹשְׂאִים֩ <S%H5375><s%> bearing שִׁבְעָ֨ה <S%H7651><s%> seven שׁוֹפְר֜וֹת <S%H7782><s%> trumpets הַיֹּבְלִ֗ים <S%H3104><s%> of rams' horns לִפְנֵי֙ <S%H6440><s%> before אֲר֣וֹן <S%H727><s%> the ark יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD הֹלְכִ֣ים <S%H1980><s%> went on הָל֔וֹךְ <S%H1980><s%> continually וְתָקְע֖וּ <S%H8628><s%> and blew בַּשּׁוֹפָר֑וֹת <S%H7782><s%> with the trumpets וְהֶחָלוּץ֙ <S%H2502><s%> and the armed men הֹלֵ֣ךְ <S%H1980><s%> went לִפְנֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H6440><s%> before וְהַֽמְאַסֵּ֗ף <S%H622><s%> them but the rereward הֹלֵךְ֙ <S%H1980><s%> came אַֽחֲרֵי֙ <S%H310><s%> after אֲר֣וֹן <S%H727><s%> the ark יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD [הֹולֵךְ כ] (הָלֹ֖וךְ <S%H1980><s%> came ק) וְתָק֥וֹעַ <S%H8628><s%> and blowing בַּשּׁוֹפָרֽוֹת׃ <S%H7782><s%> with the trumpets

וַיָּסֹ֨בּוּ <S%H5437><s%> they compassed אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָעִ֜יר <S%H5892><s%> the city בַּיּ֤וֹם <S%H3117><s%> day הַשֵּׁנִי֙ <S%H8145><s%> And the second פַּ֣עַם <S%H6471><s%> anvil אַחַ֔ת <S%H259><s%> a וַיָּשֻׁ֖בוּ <S%H7725><s%> and returned הַֽמַּחֲנֶ֑ה <S%H4264><s%> into the camp כֹּ֥ה <S%H3541><s%> so עָשׂ֖וּ <S%H6213><s%> so they did שֵׁ֥שֶׁת <S%H8337><s%> six יָמִֽים׃ <S%H3117><s%> days

וַיְהִ֣י ׀ <S%H1961><s%> become בַּיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> day הַשְּׁבִיעִ֗י <S%H7637><s%> And it came to pass on the seventh וַיַּשְׁכִּ֙מוּ֙ <S%H7925><s%> that they rose early כַּעֲל֣וֹת <S%H7837><s%> of the day הַשַּׁ֔חַר <S%H7837><s%> of the day וַיָּסֹ֧בּוּ <S%H5437><s%> and compassed אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָעִ֛יר <S%H5892><s%> the city כַּמִּשְׁפָּ֥ט <S%H4941><s%> after the same manner הַזֶּ֖ה <S%H2088><s%> the same שֶׁ֣בַע <S%H7651><s%> seven פְּעָמִ֑ים <S%H6471><s%> times רַ֚ק <S%H7535><s%> that בַּיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> only on that day הַה֔וּא <S%H1931><s%> he סָבְב֥וּ <S%H5437><s%> they compassed אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָעִ֖יר <S%H5892><s%> the city שֶׁ֥בַע <S%H7651><s%> seven פְּעָמִֽים׃ <S%H6471><s%> times

וַיְהִי֙ <S%H1961><s%> become בַּפַּ֣עַם <S%H6471><s%> time הַשְּׁבִיעִ֔ית <S%H7637><s%> And it came to pass at the seventh תָּקְע֥וּ <S%H8628><s%> blew הַכֹּהֲנִ֖ים <S%H3548><s%> when the priests בַּשּׁוֹפָר֑וֹת <S%H7782><s%> with the trumpets וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יְהוֹשֻׁ֤עַ <S%H3091><s%> Joshua אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הָעָם֙ <S%H5971><s%> unto the people הָרִ֔יעוּ <S%H7321><s%> Shout כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for נָתַ֧ן <S%H5414><s%> hath given יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> for the LORD לָכֶ֖ם אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָעִֽיר׃ <S%H5892><s%> you the city

וְהָיְתָ֨ה <S%H1961><s%> become הָעִ֥יר <S%H5892><s%> And the city חֵ֛רֶם <S%H2764><s%> shall be accursed הִ֥יא <S%H1931><s%> it וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> who בָּ֖הּ לַֽיהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> [even] it and all that [are] therein to the LORD רַק֩ <S%H7535><s%> but רָחָ֨ב <S%H7343><s%> only Rahab הַזּוֹנָ֜ה <S%H2181><s%> the harlot תִּֽחְיֶ֗ה <S%H2421><s%> shall live הִ֚יא <S%H1931><s%> he וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> whom אִתָּ֣הּ <S%H854><s%> her in בַּבַּ֔יִת <S%H1004><s%> she and all that [are] with her in the house כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> because הֶחְבְּאַ֔תָה <S%H2244><s%> because she hid אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמַּלְאָכִ֖ים <S%H4397><s%> the messengers אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> whom שָׁלָֽחְנוּ׃ <S%H7971><s%> that we sent

וְרַק־ <S%H7535><s%> And ye in any wise אַתֶּם֙ <S%H859><s%> you שִׁמְר֣וּ <S%H8104><s%> keep מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> some הַחֵ֔רֶם <S%H2764><s%> [yourselves] from the accursed thing פֶּֽן־ <S%H6435><s%> so תַּחֲרִ֖ימוּ <S%H2763><s%> lest ye make [yourselves] accursed וּלְקַחְתֶּ֣ם <S%H3947><s%> when ye take מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> some הַחֵ֑רֶם <S%H2764><s%> of the accursed thing וְשַׂמְתֶּ֞ם <S%H7760><s%> and make אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מַחֲנֵ֤ה <S%H4264><s%> the camp יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel לְחֵ֔רֶם <S%H2764><s%> a curse וַעֲכַרְתֶּ֖ם <S%H5916><s%> and trouble אוֹתֽוֹ׃ <S%H853><s%>

וְכֹ֣ל ׀ <S%H3605><s%> all כֶּ֣סֶף <S%H3701><s%> But all the silver וְזָהָ֗ב <S%H2091><s%> and gold וּכְלֵ֤י <S%H3627><s%> and vessels נְחֹ֙שֶׁת֙ <S%H5178><s%> of brass וּבַרְזֶ֔ל <S%H1270><s%> and iron קֹ֥דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> [are] consecrated ה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> he לַֽיהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD אוֹצַ֥ר <S%H214><s%> into the treasury יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD יָבֽוֹא׃ <S%H935><s%> they shall come

וַיָּ֣רַע <S%H7321><s%> shouted הָעָ֔ם <S%H5971><s%> So the people וַֽיִּתְקְע֖וּ <S%H8628><s%> when [the priests] blew בַּשֹּֽׁפָר֑וֹת <S%H7782><s%> with the trumpets וַיְהִי֩ <S%H1961><s%> become כִשְׁמֹ֨עַ <S%H8085><s%> heard הָעָ֜ם <S%H5971><s%> and it came to pass when the people אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ק֣וֹל <S%H6963><s%> the sound הַשּׁוֹפָ֗ר <S%H7782><s%> of the trumpet וַיָּרִ֤יעוּ <S%H7321><s%> shouted הָעָם֙ <S%H5971><s%> and the people תְּרוּעָ֣ה <S%H8643><s%> shout גְדוֹלָ֔ה <S%H1419><s%> with a great וַתִּפֹּ֨ל <S%H5307><s%> fell down flat הַֽחוֹמָ֜ה <S%H2346><s%> that the wall תַּחְתֶּ֗יהָ <S%H8478><s%> flat וַיַּ֨עַל <S%H5927><s%> went up הָעָ֤ם <S%H5971><s%> so that the people הָעִ֙ירָה֙ <S%H5892><s%> into the city אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> every man נֶגְדּ֔וֹ <S%H5048><s%> straight וַֽיִּלְכְּד֖וּ <S%H3920><s%> straight before him and they took אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָעִֽיר׃ <S%H5892><s%> the city

וַֽיַּחֲרִ֙ימוּ֙ <S%H2763><s%> And they utterly destroyed אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> everything אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> it בָּעִ֔יר <S%H5892><s%> all that [was] in the city מֵאִישׁ֙ <S%H376><s%> both man וְעַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against אִשָּׁ֔ה <S%H802><s%> and woman מִנַּ֖עַר <S%H5288><s%> young וְעַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against זָקֵ֑ן <S%H2205><s%> and old וְעַ֨ד <S%H5704><s%> against שׁ֥וֹר <S%H7794><s%> and ox וָשֶׂ֛ה <S%H7716><s%> and sheep וַחֲמ֖וֹר <S%H2543><s%> and ass לְפִי־ <S%H6310><s%> with the edge חָֽרֶב׃ <S%H2719><s%> of the sword

וְלִשְׁנַ֨יִם <S%H8147><s%> unto the two הָאֲנָשִׁ֜ים <S%H582><s%> men הַֽמְרַגְּלִ֤ים <S%H7270><s%> that had spied out אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאָ֙רֶץ֙ <S%H776><s%> the country אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> had said יְהוֹשֻׁ֔עַ <S%H3091><s%> But Joshua בֹּ֖אוּ <S%H935><s%> Go בֵּית־ <S%H1004><s%> house הָאִשָּׁ֣ה <S%H802><s%> thence the woman הַזּוֹנָ֑ה <S%H2181><s%> into the harlot's וְהוֹצִ֨יאוּ <S%H3318><s%> and bring out מִשָּׁ֤ם <S%H8033><s%> of there אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָֽאִשָּׁה֙ <S%H802><s%> the woman וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> after לָ֔הּ כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> you נִשְׁבַּעְתֶּ֖ם <S%H7650><s%> and all that she hath as ye sware לָֽהּ׃

וַיָּבֹ֜אוּ <S%H935><s%> went in הַנְּעָרִ֣ים <S%H5288><s%> And the young men הַֽמְרַגְּלִ֗ים <S%H7270><s%> that were spies וַיֹּצִ֡יאוּ <S%H3318><s%> and brought out אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> רָ֠חָב <S%H7343><s%> Rahab וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אָבִ֨יהָ <S%H1><s%> and her father וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אִמָּ֤הּ <S%H517><s%> and her mother וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אַחֶ֙יהָ֙ <S%H251><s%> and her brethren וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> after לָ֔הּ וְאֵ֥ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all מִשְׁפְּחוֹתֶ֖יהָ <S%H4940><s%> all her kindred הוֹצִ֑יאוּ <S%H3318><s%> and all that she had and they brought out וַיַּ֨נִּיח֔וּם <S%H3240><s%> and left מִח֖וּץ <S%H2351><s%> them without לְמַחֲנֵ֥ה <S%H4264><s%> the camp יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel

וְהָעִ֛יר <S%H5892><s%> the city שָׂרְפ֥וּ <S%H8313><s%> And they burnt בָאֵ֖שׁ <S%H784><s%> with fire וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> after בָּ֑הּ רַ֣ק ׀ <S%H7535><s%> but הַכֶּ֣סֶף <S%H3701><s%> and all that [was] therein only the silver וְהַזָּהָ֗ב <S%H2091><s%> and the gold וּכְלֵ֤י <S%H3627><s%> and the vessels הַנְּחֹ֙שֶׁת֙ <S%H5178><s%> of brass וְהַבַּרְזֶ֔ל <S%H1270><s%> and of iron נָתְנ֖וּ <S%H5414><s%> they put אוֹצַ֥ר <S%H214><s%> into the treasury בֵּית־ <S%H1004><s%> of the house יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD

וְֽאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> רָחָ֣ב <S%H7343><s%> Rahab הַ֠זּוֹנָה <S%H2181><s%> the harlot וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בֵּ֨ית <S%H1004><s%> household אָבִ֤יהָ <S%H1><s%> and her father's וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> whom לָהּ֙ הֶחֱיָ֣ה <S%H2421><s%> alive יְהוֹשֻׁ֔עַ <S%H3091><s%> And Joshua וַתֵּ֙שֶׁב֙ <S%H3427><s%> and all that she had and she dwelleth בְּקֶ֣רֶב <S%H7130><s%> in יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> Israel עַ֖ד <S%H5704><s%> against הַיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> [even] unto this day הַזֶּ֑ה <S%H2088><s%> to this כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> for הֶחְבִּ֙יאָה֙ <S%H2244><s%> because she hid אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמַּלְאָכִ֔ים <S%H4397><s%> the messengers אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> whom שָׁלַ֥ח <S%H7971><s%> sent יְהוֹשֻׁ֖עַ <S%H3091><s%> which Joshua לְרַגֵּ֥ל <S%H7270><s%> to spy out אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְרִיחֽוֹ׃ <S%H3405><s%> Jericho פ

וַיַּשְׁבַּ֣ע <S%H7650><s%> adjured יְהוֹשֻׁ֔עַ <S%H3091><s%> And Joshua בָּעֵ֥ת <S%H6256><s%> [them] at that time הַהִ֖יא <S%H1931><s%> he לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> saying אָר֨וּר <S%H779><s%> Cursed הָאִ֜ישׁ <S%H376><s%> [be] the man לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> before יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> who יָקוּם֙ <S%H6965><s%> that riseth up וּבָנָ֞ה <S%H1129><s%> and buildeth אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָעִ֤יר <S%H5892><s%> this city הַזֹּאת֙ <S%H2063><s%> likewise אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְרִיח֔וֹ <S%H3405><s%> Jericho בִּבְכֹר֣וֹ <S%H1060><s%> thereof in his firstborn יְיַסְּדֶ֔נָּה <S%H3245><s%> he shall lay the foundation וּבִצְעִיר֖וֹ <S%H6810><s%> and in his youngest יַצִּ֥יב <S%H5324><s%> [son] shall he set up דְּלָתֶֽיהָ׃ <S%H1817><s%> the gates

וַיְהִ֥י <S%H1961><s%> become יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> So the LORD אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> was with יְהוֹשֻׁ֑עַ <S%H3091><s%> was with Joshua וַיְהִ֥י <S%H1961><s%> become שָׁמְע֖וֹ <S%H8089><s%> and his fame בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> was [noised] throughout all the country
